pages.title: Heat Reservoir
pages.text: The <item>Heat Reservoir/$ is effectively a heat "battery". The temperature of the <item>reservoir/$ changes <em>extremely/$ slowly, making a <item>reservoir/$ smooth out temperature fluctuations over minutes or hours.$(br2)<item>$(l:crossroads:heat/cable)Cables/$ can connect to any side, and the <item>heat reservoir/$ keeps its temperature
This block pairs well with <item>$(l:crossroads:heat/solar)Solar Heaters/$ to make them viable at night.$(br2)
